Thank you for using our DeltaMedic app. The privacy and security of your personal data is of utmost importance to us. Below we detail how we collect, use and protect your information:

Personal Information: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide, such as name, date of birth, email address, medical history, symptoms, and any other information relevant to your health.
Usage Information: We may collect information about how you interact with the application, including access logs, activities performed and usage preferences.
We use the information collected to provide personalized medical services, including diagnoses, health recommendations, medication reminders, and symptom tracking.
The information may also be used to improve our services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you about app updates and news.

We will not share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except when necessary to comply with the law, protect our rights, or in situations requiring urgent medical assistance.
We may share anonymous and aggregated data for statistical and research purposes.
We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, misuse or disclosure.
We regularly review our security practices and update our systems to maintain the integrity and confidentiality of your data.
You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal information at any time.
You may opt out of receiving promotional email communications by following the instructions provided in such communications.
Our application is intended for people over 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from minors without verifiable consent from their parents or legal guardians.
We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. You will be notified of any significant changes by an in-app notification or by other appropriate means.
If you have questions or concerns about our privacy and security terms, or how we handle your personal information, please feel free to contact us at [contact email.
By using DeltaMedic, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting us with your personal information and for using our services to improve your health and well-being.
